an3.61:2.5: ca me → te ce me (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
an3.61:7.1: Ahetuappaccayaṃ → ahetuṃ appaccayaṃ (bj) | ahetuṃ (si) | ahetu (s1-3, km) | ahetuappaccayā (pts1) | ahetuṃ appaccayaṃ (mr)
an3.61:14.2: () → (byādhipi dukkho) (bj, mr) | (vyādhi pi dukkhā) (pts1), appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho → etthantare pāṭho katthaci
